div.p: This site provides information using PDF, visit this link to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software.

div.h3: We're doing some amazing things. Take a peek inside of our classrooms to see our creative and collaborative minds at work.

div.p: Pennoyer School will have free boxed breakfasts and lunches available for pick up at Pennoyer School on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 9:30am-11:00am.
These are for anyone under the age of 18 in our community.

ul.class: csw cs-icon-group-stacked cs-icon-sm cs-icon-left cs-icon-default cs-icon-bg-default cs-icon-text-default

strong.a: Click here for information on Pennoyer School's Strategic Planning

p.b: Pennoyer School District 79 staff, parents, and community members will empower students and foster their development in their present and future academic and life experiences.
Continue to foster empathetic, inclusive, and nurturing learning environment.
Expand opportunities for collaboration and creative thinking.
Create a platform for expression of student voice and choice.
The pathway to our vision includes
Acknowledging all exceptionalities and expanding opportunities for students.
Encouraging students to take an active role in their academic lives.
Engaging parents and the community for the success of the school.

h3.a: PENNOYER SCHOOL DISTRICT 79 HIRES A NEW PRINCIPAL TO START JULY 1, 2020
